title: Trump’s Authoritarian Innovations
description: During his second presidency, Donald Trump has joined a long line of autocrats who come to power through elections only to erode democracy, with the ultimate goal of installing an authoritarian regime. But much about his first year back in office more closely…
content: During his second presidency, Donald Trump has joined a long line of autocrats who come to power through elections only to erode democracy, with the ultimate goal of installing an authoritarian regim… [+13535 chars]
